name: 13step-variabledeclaration
description: A variable can be declared by three ways as follows:- - var - let  - const ## Block Scope Block Scope means variable can be used only in curly braces. let and const are both block scope. ## let The value of variable in the let can also be change or reassign . ## const In which the value of variable or array can not be assign . But the value of array can be change by method (like push(),pop()).
